thread.title: Weekend girls trip
thread.title_full: Weekend girls trip - Review of Hotel Diana, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: stripeygirl
title: Weekend girls trip
text:
There were 3 of us sharing the triple room, and it was fab. Big enough room for us all, clean and tidy decor, comfortable beds, and a decent bathroom. For the price we paid, I can really recommend this triple room. The lady who booked us in was so helpful and friendly. Location wise, it is a 5 minute walk from the Notre Dame station up the hill, so perfectly convienient for bus tours and walking along the Seine.
Room Tip: Our friend had a smaller single below us, and she didn't get tea/coffee facilities, so if not in... See more room tips
